FitHappens

Stack: Python, PostgreSQL, Flask, Jinja, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, AWS
Features:
• Track schedules and add event on calendar which is rendered from FullCalendar.io.
• Retrieved data from a Rest API (Workout manager). Data is stored in a PostgreSQL database.
• Deployed with AWS Lightsail.

Summary: A full stack web application for fitness trainers to manage their clients.

Project Github

Dating Game in React

Stack: Vanilla JS
Summary: Interact with 3 built-in characters, choose activities for dates and topics to chat which determine different endings with different characters.
